16.title: What Is Western Civilization?
16.plot: A classicist joins the Panel of Deplorables to help define western civilization.

17.title: Hurricane Harvey: Trump Sidesteps MSM Tsunami
17.plot: The media is furious that Trump is handling Hurricane Harvey well.

18.title: Prosperity Podcast: Your Best Car Ride Now!
18.plot: Joel Osteen is accused of denying refuge to Hurricane Harvey victims. Hillary Clinton hits the road. North Korea fires a missile over Japan. The European Society of Cardiology recommends coffee.

19.title: Feminism: A Well-Heeled Farce
19.plot: Melania Trump's high heels lead to high dudgeon. A sexegenarian millennial talks about feminism. The all-female Panel of Deplorables discuss Kim Jong-un, evangelicals, sexual identities and more.

20.title: Are Democrats De-Sanctifying Abortion?
20.plot: The Democrats express willingness to accept pro-life candidates. The Panel of Deplorables discuss abortion, Charlie Hebdo and a crass joke by a policeman.

21.title: North Korea, Bad Government and Babies
21.plot: Bethany Mandel of "The Federalist" talks about a charity organization called Liberty in North Korea, the chlamydia in her eye, and the baby she had on the side of the highway.

22.title: Everything You Wanted to Know About Ben Shapiro, But Were Too Afraid to Ask
22.plot: Ben Shapiro guests, and talks political philosophy, religion, metaphysics, illegal immigration, playing the violin for Larry King, and getting bullied in high school.

23.title: Arming Snowflakes: Antonia Okafor on Campus Carry
23.plot: Antonia Okafor wants women college students to carry guns. The Panel of Deplorables, including Zo Rachel and Paul Bois, discusses Dianne Feinstein vs. Amy Coney Barrett, DACA, and the Free the Nipple movement.

24.title: Is the Swamp Swallowing Trump?
24.plot: Michaels asks the former New York congresswoman Nan Hayworth about swamp monsters. Emily Butler and Jacob Airey join the Panel of Deplorables to talk Miss America, Steve Bannon, and more.

25.title: All Politics Is Local.... Or National
25.plot: Michael talks to his longtime friend, the Greenwood Lake, NY, mayor Jesse Dwyer. The Panel of Deplorables, including Amber Athey and Amanda Prestigiacomo, discuss Ted Cruz, an uncontacted tribe, and more.

26.title: Battle of Berkeley
26.plot: UC Berkeley was once the hotbed of the free speech movement, now it's the center of an anti-free speech movement. The rapper, XXXTentacion, releases a video featuring racial violence. PewDiePie apologizes for saying the n-word on a video. Criminals vandalize New York's Central Park statue of Christopher Columbus.

27.title: Pussycat Doll vs. Pussy-Hat Dolls
27.plot: Joy Villa and Kaya Jones discuss their experiences as conservatives in the music industry. Harvard University honors Chelsea Manning. Donald Trump makes a deal with Chuck Schumer and Nancy Pelosi.

28.title: Everything Is Worse on TV
28.plot: The Emmys show that Hollywood celebrities think of nothing but Donald Trump. Trump insults the United Nations. A Christian numerologist predicts the rapture in five days.

29.title: Love in the Time of MAGA
29.plot: Michael disputes the notion that he does the show only to talk to beautiful women. Roaming Millennial talks about being a born-again Christian. Erielle Davidson guests.

30.title: Snowflakes and the End of Days
30.plot: Allie Stuckey satirizes a snowflake millennial. The panelists guess which quotations were said by an adult and which by a young child. The Republican Governors Association creates a media outlet.

31.title: Why Can't the Left Take a Joke
31.plot: Jimmy Kimmel is violently angry with Brian Kilmeade. A new study says global warming is happening slower than we thought. James Damore, formerly of Google, has written a controversial piece on the KKK.

32.title: Free Speech Hour ft. Dave Rubin
32.plot: Michael attempts to save the soul of his guest, Dave Rubin. Allie Stuckey and Jacob Airey join the Panel of Deplorables to discuss the NFL, Anthony Weiner, and more.

33.title: Is Trump Playing 4-D Football?
33.plot: Donald Trump may be playing 3D chess when he inserts himself into the football debate. Video chat malfunctions for guest Mary M. Lane. The Panel of Deplorables consists of Erielle Davidson, Amanda Prestigiacomo and Paul Bois.

34.title: Did Trump Win or Lose the Alabama State Primary?
34.plot: Donald Trump's preferred candidate for U.S. Senator in Alabama loses, but Trump himself may have won. Michael performs George Clooney's poem.

35.title: RIP, Hef
35.plot: Hugh Hefner is dead at 91, and Michael asks whether his was a life well-lived. The Lingerie Football League stands up for America while the NFL takes the knee.

36.title: #ThoughtsAndPrayers in Las Vegas
36.plot: Michael finally has his interview with journalist Mary M. Lane. The Panel of Deplorables discuss John Kasich possibly leaving the Republican party, UK schools abolishing B.C. and A.D. dating, and more.

37.title: Christopher Columbus Actually Was a Great Man
37.plot: In a special Columbus Day episode, Michael makes the case for Christopher Columbus's greatness and defends him from leftist criticism.

38.title: Donald Trump, Traditionalist, or: What I Learned in the UK
38.plot: Michael returns from England and has thoughts about how conservatism mean something different in the UK. Investor Hal Lambert guests. Emily Butler and Paul Bois make up the Panel of Deplorables.

39.title: Day of the Girl
39.plot: Michael welcomes his in-studio guest, Blaire White, a transgender woman with politically incorrect views.

40.title: Ideologies Are Parasites
40.plot: Guest Jordan B. Peterson explains why ideology is a parasite. The Panel of Deplorables discusses Donald Trump dismantling Obamacare, a Canadian family freed from the Taliban, and more.

41.title: The NYT Is Trash: An Historical Retrospective
41.plot: Jane Coaston attacks Ben Shapiro in the New York Times, leading Michael to detail the paper's shaky record on the truth. Alyssa Milano kicks off the Twitter hashtag, #MeToo.

42.title: Trump Wants Hillary to Run Again #MeToo
42.plot: Donald Trump accuses of Hillary Clinton of disrespecting the country. Slacktivists on Twitter tackle the issue of sexual assault with the #MeToo. hashtag. Michael welcomes into the studio his first Democrat.

43.title: President Trump at #War
43.plot: Florida congresswoman Frederica Wilson claims that Donald Trump was rude to one of her constituents, the wife of a fallen soldier. Hillary Clinton slams Donald Trump's handling of North Korea. Elisha Krauss, Amber Athey and Amanda Prestigiacomo make up the Panel of Deplorables; they discuss: Steve Bannon's machinations re Mitch McConnell; the War on Halloween; a gay Jewish ex-neo-Nazi; and more.

44.title: Fake News Is Fake News
44.plot: Michael Knowles welcomes fellow Daily Wire-r Andrew Klavan, aka Andy Millennial, to discuss Hollywood and the podcast the two have collaborated on.

45.title: Bowe Bergdahl: Aiding the Enemy and Obama's Art of the Deal
45.plot: U.S. Army Sergeant Bowe Bergdahl awaits sentencing after pleading guilty to desertion. Amber Athey and Paul Bois make up the Panel of Deplorables.

46.title: The Democrats Colluded with Russia
46.plot: Democrats have spent months accusing Donald Trump of colluding with Russia, but it turns out that Democrats may have colluded with Russia. Elisha Krauss and Jacob Airey make up the Panel of Deplorables.

47.title: F Is for Flake: Is Trump Rino Repellant?
47.plot: Perez Hilton guests to talk about the fallout from the Harvey Weinstein scandal. Allie Stuckey, Erielle Davidson and Emily Butler make up the Panel of Deplorables.

48.title: Happy Birthday, Hillary!
48.plot: The CEO of Prager U., Marissa Streit, guests. Michael celebrates the birthday of his cousin, Hillary Clinton. Candace Owens (aka Red Pill Black), Amanda Prestigiacomo, and Jacob Airey make up the Panel of Deplorables.

49.title: Mueller Indicts Democrats
49.plot: Robert Mueller indicts Paul Manafort. Anthony Rapp accuses Kevin Spacey of assaulting him as a 14-year-old. John Boehner slams fellow Republicans in a foul-mouthed rant.

50.title: Reformation Day? Dr. Martin Luther Will Have It So!
50.plot: Michael dresses as Disney's Moana, not realizing the costume is racist. Michael lists ten facts about Martin Luther. Kira Davis makes her debut on the Panel of Deplorables.

51.title: Religion of Peace, Media of Euphemisms
51.plot: An Islamist named Sayfullo Saipov drives a Home Depot truck down a bike path in Manhattan, killing eight. Michael says we are living in a world of unclear language. Bradley Devlin, Kevin Glass and Paul Bois make up the Panel of Deplorables. They discuss: Donald Trump Jr.'s Twitter trolling; trick-or-treating; socialism; sexual assault in Hollywood; tax reform and Donald Trump's proposed "Cut Cut Cut Act"; and more.

52.title: Crooked Hillary Rigged the Election
52.plot: Donna Brazile's new book confirms that Hillary Clinton rigged the DNC primaries. The DNC data services manager Madeleine Leader doesn't want to hire "cisgender straight white males".

53.title: Our Great Mikado, Virtuous Man
53.plot: CNN tries to make Donald Trump's meeting with Shinzo Abe look bad. Emily Butler and Jacob Airey make up the Panel of Deplorables. They discuss: Donna Brazile, the Texas church shooting, and more.

54.title: 100 Years of Useful Communist Idiots
54.plot: Michael commemorates 100 awful years of communism. Candace Owens (aka Red Pill Black), Erielle Davidson, and Paul Bois make up the Panel of Deplorables. They discuss gun control, the Virginia gubernatorial election, and more.

55.title: Last Night's Big Winner: The MSM's Narrative
55.plot: Michael analyzes the analysis of the Democrats' victory in the various state elections. Liz Wheeler, Roaming Millennial and Elisha Krauss make up the Panel of Deplorables.

56.title: Happy Trump-aversary: 365 Days of Covfefe
56.plot: Michael celebrates the anniversary of Donald Trump's election. Kristen Soltis Anderson, a columnist in the Washington Examiner, joins Michael in studio to discuss the outlook for Republicans in 2018.

57.title: Roy Moore Now Chooses to Live as a Gay Man
57.plot: Gloria Allred brings forth the most damaging accuser yet against Roy Moore. The New York Times comes out in favor of segregation. Roaming Millennial, Amber Athey, and Paul Bois make up the Panel of Deplorables.

58.title: Dems Grill Sessions on Russia: Do You Still Beat Your Wife?
58.plot: The Democrats humiliate themselves grilling Jeff Sessions over Russia. Donald Trump gets the UCLA Bruins players detained in China released. Josh Yasmeh and Cabot Phillips make up the Panel of Deplorables.

59.title: Cynical Democrats Suddenly Recant Sex Crimes
59.plot: Democrats retroactively find Bill Clinton deplorable now that they need to condemn Roy Moore. Cards Against Humanity tries to stop Donald Trump's wall. Amelia Hamilton makes her debut on the Panel of the Deplorables.

60.title: Luther Revisited
60.plot: Eric Metaxas guests and defends Martin Luther. Austen Fletcher (aka Fleccas Talks), Bradley Devlin and Elisha Krauss make up the Panel of Deplorables.

61.title: Kill the Elephants, or Else They'll Die
61.plot:

62.title: Winning: ISIS Is Over
62.plot: ISIS is defeated. Charlie Rose is exposed. Bradley Devlin, Amber Athey and Elisha Krauss make up the Panel of Deplorables.

63.title: Thanksgiving: The Land Was Ours
63.plot: Michael tells the real story of Thanksgiving.

64.title: And the Fake News Trophy Goes to... The CFPB
64.plot: Michael's first Fake News Trophy goes to Leandra English, the fake head of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau. Asawin Suebsaeng (a rare lefty) and Amanda Prestigiacomo make up the Panel of Deplorables.

65.title: The Swampy Shore: Reality TV Reality

66.title: Watch Trump's Fingers

67.title: Christmas Comes Early! Tax Cuts
67.plot: Leo Severino guests to talk about his book, "Going Deeper: How Thinking About Ordinary Experience Leads Us to God". Jason Russell and Vincent Butta make up the Panel of Deplorables.

68.title: The Consensus Is Always Wrong
68.plot: Donald Trump passes tax reform, even though everyone said he wouldn't. Laura Barron Lopez and Amanda Prestigiacomo make up the Panel of Deplorables.

69.title: #NoMeansNo Unless #LoveWins
69.plot: The Supreme Court is set to decide on gay wedding cakes. Schoolkids can have chocolate milk again. Amber Athey and Roaming Millennial make up the Panel of Deplorables.

70.title: Embassy In Jerusalem, Fire Destroying Hollywood: Are These the End Times?
70.plot: Democrats sacrifice John Conyers and Al Franken, but not Bob Menendez. Trump is moving the embassy from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem. Lauren Cooley and Jacob Airey make up the Panel of Deplorables.

71.title: The War on Christmas: A History
71.plot: Michael dresses as Douglas MacArthur to relate the history of the War on Christmas.

72.title: CNN is Literally Hitler
72.plot: CNN, The Washington Post and ABC News proffer fake news. Victor Davis Hanson helps Michael kick off his new segment: "This Day in History".

73.title: Keaton Jones: Why We Can't Have Nice Things
73.plot: Social media turns on young Keaton Jones (or at least his mother) as fast as it made him famous. Jimmy Kimmel exploits his baby son.

74.title: The Russians Hacked Alabama
74.plot: Roy Moore loses the U.S Senate seat in Alabama to Democrat Doug Jones. Allie Stuckey and Amanda Prestigiacomo make up the Panel of Deplorables.

75.title: 'Net Neutrality': Trump Makes The Internet Free Again
75.plot: Trump kills net neutrality. A Kentucky lawmaker kills himself after an accusation of sexual assault. Cabot Phillips and Paul Bois make up the Panel of Deplorables. Michael answers the mailbag.

76.title: The Best Words: Trump vs. PC at the CDC
76.plot: Al Franken may not resign after all. Donald Trump is accused of banning words at the CDC. Elisha Krauss and Amanda Prestigiacomo make up the Panel of Deplorables.

77.title: Cultural Death and Taxes
77.plot: Fake news re the Republican tax bill spreads. Michael celebrates the anniversary of Bill Clinton's impeachment.

78.title: The Rapture
78.plot: Democrats explode into hysteria after the Trump tax plan passes. Matt Walsh of the Daily Wire makes his debut on the Panel of Deplorables.

79.title: It's Time to Defund the U.N.

94.title: Cecile Richards, Maniacal Ghoul: A Retrospective
94.plot: Cecile Richards steps down from Planned Parenthood. Liz Wheeler and Erielle Davidson make up the Panel of Deplorables.

95.title: The Grammys Prove Aristotle Right
95.plot: The Grammys are a ratings disaster. Elisha Krauss and Allie Stuckey make up the Panel of Deplorables; they discuss Andrew McCabe, euthanasia, the sex appeal of conservatives, and more.

102.title: Nancy Pelosi and Democrat Yammering Through the Ages

103.title: How Cronkite Turned the MSM Against the USA
103.plot: The media fawns over Kim Jong-Un's sister, leading Michael to a discussion of Walter Cronkite.
